props.name: addTitle
props.desc: Text to include for adding a title.

props.name: autoCreate
props.desc:
A DomHelper element spec, or true for a default element spec (defaults to
{tag: "input", type: "checkbox", autocomplete: "off"})

props.name: height
props.desc: - used to restrict height of grid..

props.name: width
props.desc: - used to restrict width of grid..

props.name: xgrid
props.desc: (xtype'd description of grid) Grid or EditorGrid
